trans-unit.source: Enumerates the types of data pointers passed to speech synthesis events.
trans-unit.target: Enumera los tipos de punteros de datos transferidos a los eventos de la síntesis de voz.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType> is used when constructing a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType> se utiliza para crear un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> objeto.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType> passed as the `parameterType` argument to the constructor for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> specifies how the `param2` argument of the constructor (which must be a `System.IntPtr`) is interpreted.
trans-unit.target: Una instancia de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType> pasa como el `parameterType` argumento al constructor de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> especifica cómo el `param2` argumento del constructor (que debe ser un `System.IntPtr`) se interpreta.

trans-unit.source: The choice of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType> is dictated by the type of event being requested, as specified by a member of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>.
trans-unit.target: La opción de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType> viene determinado por el tipo de evento que se solicita, tal y como especifica un miembro de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>.

trans-unit.source: For detailed information on how use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType>, see documentation for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>
trans-unit.target: Para obtener información detallada acerca de cómo usar <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType>, vea la documentación de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>

trans-unit.source: The example below is part of a custom speech synthesis implementation inheriting from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>, and using the use of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente forma parte de una implementación de síntesis de voz personalizados heredando de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>y el uso de la utilización de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, y <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>
trans-unit.target: La implementación de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: Receives an array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances and creates a new array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances to be passed to the `Speak` method on an underlying synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Recibe una matriz de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instancias y crea una nueva matriz de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instancias que se pasan a la `Speak` método en un motor de síntesis subyacente.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> enumeration value by found from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property of each <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instance is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, the implementation
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> por obtener valor de enumeración de la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> propiedad en el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> devuelto por la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> propiedad de cada <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instancia es <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, la implementación

trans-unit.source: Translates Americanism to Britishisms in the text to be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Traduce Americanism a Britishisms en el texto que se va a hablar.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interfaces provided to the implementation support the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> event type, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance is used to create an event to drive a synthesizer progress meter is created.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> propiedad en el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interfaces proporcionadas para la compatibilidad de implementación el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> tipo de evento, un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instancia se utiliza para crear un evento que se crea un indicador de progreso de sintetizador de unidad.

trans-unit.source: The parameters on <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, including the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType> member value returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A>, are used to log the event generated through the `LogSpeechEvent` method.
trans-unit.target: Los parámetros en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, incluido el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType> devuelto por el valor de miembro <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A>, se utilizan para iniciar el evento que se genera a través de la `LogSpeechEvent` método.

trans-unit.source: A speech rendering engine is then called with the modified <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> array.
trans-unit.target: A continuación, se llama a un motor de representación de voz con modificados <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> matriz.

trans-unit.source: Currently not supported.
trans-unit.target: Actualmente no se admite.

trans-unit.source: Currently not supported.
trans-unit.target: Actualmente no se admite.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <paramref name="param2" /> argument to the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> is a <see langword="System.IntPtr" /> created using <see langword="System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.StringToCoTaskMemUni" /> referencing a <see langword="System.String" /> object; <paramref name="param1" /> may take on any value.
trans-unit.target: Indica que el argumento <paramref name="param2" /> para <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> es un objeto <see langword="System.IntPtr" /> creado mediante <see langword="System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.StringToCoTaskMemUni" /> que hace referencia a un objeto <see langword="System.String" />; <paramref name="param1" /> puede tomar cualquier valor.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <paramref name="param2" /> argument to the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> is a
trans-unit.target: Indica que el argumento <paramref name="param2" /> para <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> es

trans-unit.source: is a `System.IntPtr` created using `System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure`
trans-unit.target: es un `System.IntPtr` siguieron `System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure`

trans-unit.source: referencing a Windows Desktop Speech Technology token --a Windows Desktop Speech Technology object representing a resource, such as a voice (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>); `param1` may take on any value.
trans-unit.target: hacer referencia a una tecnología de voz de escritorio de Windows token--una tecnología de voz de escritorio de Windows objeto que representa un recurso, como una voz (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>); `param1` puede tardar en cualquier valor.

trans-unit.source: Currently instances of a managed synthetic speech engines, written using the members of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> name space, cannot change resources after construction
trans-unit.target: Actualmente instancias de un motores de voz sintético administrado, escrito con los miembros de la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> espacio de nombres, no se puede cambiar los recursos después de la construcción

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <paramref name="param2" /> argument to the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> is undefined.
trans-unit.target: Indica que el argumento <paramref name="param2" /> para <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> no está definido.

trans-unit.source: Generally, `param1` and `param2` are then ignored.
trans-unit.target: Por lo general, `param1` y `param2` , a continuación, se omiten.

trans-unit.source: However, if <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId> is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary>, a progress meter event can be generated `param1` should be an integer containing the length of the current word, and `param2` a `System.IntPtr` referencing an integer containing the offset of the current word.
trans-unit.target: Sin embargo, si <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId> es <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary>, se puede generar un evento de indicador de progreso `param1` debe ser un entero que contiene la longitud de la palabra actual, y `param2` un `System.IntPtr` que hacen referencia a un entero que contiene el desplazamiento del elemento actual Word.
